room_title: Escape room "Back to the 90's" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: We did back to the 90's with cousin Ashley. We had a full group with two halves getting to know each others strengths and escaping with 2 min 38 sec to spare. Had such a fun time following the storyline set in place. As we worked together solving the puzzles. Thank you cousin Ashley for being so clear and adventurous for us all.

room_title: Escape room "Back to the 90's" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Phenomenal time with the Back to the 90s edition! Mary was our staff person, she was excellent. Had an A+ time, highly recommend to anyone considering.And note: this isn't a scary zombie thing. That's the other edition. This is just searching for clues/riddles with a 60-minute constraint, no zombie or scary anything.5 stars! And big congrats to Mary!

room_title: Escape room "Back to the 90's" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: We had SO much fun going back in time to the 90's with Brian! He was awesome and was spot on with his description of each of us from observing us! We made it out with time to spare! I will definitely recommend Room Escape Adventures to everyone I know!

room_title: Escape room "Back to the 90's" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Back to the 90â€™s was so much fun!3 of us escaped with 9 minutes to spare. This was a fun themed escape room with clever puzzles to solve and an excellent host. Thanks Ingrid! I loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Back to the 90's" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: We did a family event in the Back to the 90's room. Our host was Cousin Michael and he was great! He stayed in character the whole time and really set the mood. The room was appropriately challenging for us. We escaped with just seconds to spare. Would definitely return!

room_title: Escape room "Back to the 90's" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: I did the 90s themed room with a group of friends. It was so much fun! Kaz was an awesome host and I would highly recommend this to anyone who loves some 90s nostalgia. I can't wait to come back and try out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Back to the 90's" by Room Escape Adventures in Chicago
review: Had a great time at the 90's escape adventure for Mother's Day. Jen, our escape guide was great. Very enthusiastic. She helped steer us back in the right direction if we were veering too far away. The room was really clever. I wish we could have spent more time after we escaped, just enjoying all the memorabilia.
